name: Claude Code Plugins Marketplace
description: A curated marketplace of plugins for Claude Code, featuring autonomous testing agents and interactive architecture review tools.

plugins.name: Interactive Architecture Agent
plugins.description: Expert architectural review through interactive questioning. NEVER assumes - always asks clarifying questions before making decisions. Features multi-agent system with incremental exploration and MVP-aware recommendations.

plugins.name: Web App Testing Agent
plugins.description: Autonomous web application testing agent. MUST BE USED when user says 'test the web app' or mentions testing functionality. Handles server management, comprehensive testing, and intelligent reporting.

installation.instructions: Clone or download plugins from this marketplace and copy to your Claude Code plugins directory.
